body_html:
Hi Johnson,

We have updated the code. As a bit of explanation, model.losses returns a list of loss tensors (this is what tf.keras.Model do, not eager specific), so we need only add this to the cross entropy within the tape context.

Hope this helped!

Chen

body:
Hi Johnson, 

We have updated the code. As a bit of explanation, `model.losses` returns a list of loss tensors (this is what `tf.keras.Model` do, not eager specific), so we need only add this to the cross entropy within the tape context.

Hope this helped!

Chen
